N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 600.1 - Public hearings

State Regulations
(a) If the

New York Gaming Facility Location Board conducts a public hearing, it shall
cause the New York State Gaming Commission to post a notice of such hearing on
the Gaming Commission's website a reasonable period of time before such
hearing. (b) Any member of the New

York Gaming Facility Location Board may preside over a public hearing as chair
of the meeting. The conduct of the meeting shall be in the sole and absolute
discretion of the chair, who may decide whom to recognize to speak and limit
the time allowed to any speaker and the number of speakers. The chair of the
meeting may receive written testimony in the discretion of the chair. Notes
